projects.description: My first Treehouse Techdegree project: A random quote generator using quotes from Peloton instructors.
My second Treehouse Techdegree project: A page that displays and paginates a list of students and student data. It also includes a search bar that filters results and updates pagination.

My third Treehouse Techdegree project: An interactive registration form with real-time error messages for required fields, a conditional error message for email errors, and a feature that prevents users from registering for conflicting events. This project also has an emphasis on accessibility.
My fourth Treehouse Techdegree project: A Find-An-Affirmation game show app where a player guesses letters in a phrase. If the player can guess all the letters with 5 or less misses, they win!

My fifth Treehouse Techdegree project: A fictitious employee directory made with a public API. It includes a search option, a pop-up modal for each employee, buttons to navigate through the list of employees when the modal is open, and some custom styling and css.
